message_1: What is the time complexity of finding the maximum element in an unsorted array of n elements using a linear search algorithm? Assuming that each comparison between two elements takes one unit of time.
message_2: The time complexity of finding the maximum element in an unsorted array of n elements using a linear search algorithm is O(n), where n is the number of elements in the array. This is because you need to compare each element with the current maximum value, which requires n-1 comparisons in the worst case.
